[i]King Sword[/i] – As long as its your turn, Perne has double strike.
[i]Sol[/i] – Whenever Perne deals combat damage to a player, you gain that much life.
[i]Steal[/i] – Whenever Perne deals combat damage to a player, you may gain control of target artifact that player controls.
[i]Charm[/i] – Rogue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
